detaileddescription.para: View notification types
Constructor for MaterialDocManager.
Destructor for MaterialDocManager.

Registers an object to receive notifications about changes made to materials.
view
The object that would like to receive material notifications.

Tells the MaterialDocManager to stop sending notifications to a view.
view
The view that no longer wants notifications.
Unregisters all of the views that are registered to get material change notifications.

Tells the MaterialDocManager which material has been selected for editing.
material
The material that has been selected.
Returns true if the specified file needs to be applied and false otherwise.
Returns true if any material needs to be applied.
Returns true if the specified file has been modified.
Returns true if any material has been modified.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, const char *filename, const char *sourceText=NULL, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: AddMaterial

detaileddescription.para:
Adds a material.
name
The name of the material.
filename
The file to place the material in.
sourceText
The initial material definition.
addUndo
Can this operation be undone.

Used to redo an add material and undo a delete material. The undo for adding a material deletes the material. Instead of adding a completely new material RedoAddMaterial finds the one that was just deleted and uses that.
name
The name of the material that was added/deleted.
clearData
Should the material definition be reset to the default definition.

Deletes a material.
material
The material to be deleted.
addUndo
Can this operation be undone.

Applys changes to a material.
materialDoc
The material to be applied.

Applies all materials in the specified filename.
filename
The file to apply.
Applies all materials that have been changed.

Saves a single material.
material
The material to save.

Saves all materials in the specified file.
filename
The file to save.
Saves all materials that have been changed.

Reloads a specified file.
filename
The file to reload.

Creates a MaterialDoc object for the specified material name. If a MaterialDoc object already exists then it is used.
materialName
The name of the material for which to create a MaterialDoc object.

Creates a MaterialDoc object for the specified material. If a MaterialDoc object already exists then it is used.
material
The material for which to create a MaterialDoc object.

Checks the current list of in progress MaterialDoc objects to see if a MaterialDoc object already exists.
material
The material to check for.

Prepares a material for a copy/cut and paste operations.
materialDoc
The material to copy.
cut
Is this a cut operation.
Clears the copy buffer for a material.
Returns true if there is a material in the copy buffer.
Returns the name of the material in the copy buffer.

Performs a material paste operation for a material in the copy buffer.
name
The new name for the material that is being copied.
filename
The file to paste the material in.

Prepares a material stage for a copy/paste operation.
materialDoc
The materialDoc that contains the stage to be copied.
stageNum
the stage to copy.
Clears the copy buffer for copied stages.
Returns true if there is a stage in the copy buffer.

Performs a paste operation of the stage in the copy buffer.
materialDoc
The materialDoc to paste the stage in.

Returns information about the stage in the copy buffer.
type
Holds the type of the stage in the copy buffer.
name
Hold the name of the stage in the copy buffer.
Performs the first available undo operation.
Returns true if an undo operation is available.
Clears the entire undo buffer.
Performs the first available redo operation.
Returns true if a redo operation is available.
Clears the redo buffer.

Adds an undo operation to the undo buffer.
mod
The MaterialModifier object that contains the undo data.
clearRedo
Should we clear the redo buffer.

Adds a redo operation to the redo buffer.
mod
The MaterialModifier object that contains the redo data.

Searches for a material that matches the specified search data.
name
The name of the material to search.
searchData
The search parameters.
checkName
If true then the name of the material will be checked along with the material text.

Returns a unique material name given a base name. This is used to resolve materials with the same name.
name
The base name of the material.

Notifies all registered views of a material event.
materialDoc
The material that has been affected.
notifyType
The type of event that has occured.
...
Notification specific data. See MaterialView.

Called when a material has been edited and notifies all views of the change.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.

Called when a material has been applied and notifies all views of the apply.
materialDoc
The material that has been applied.

Called when a material has been saved and notifies all views of the save.
materialDoc
The material that has been saved.

Called when a material name has been changed and notifies all views of the change.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.

Called when a stage is added and notifies all views of the addition.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.
stageNum
The stage that was added.

Called when a stage has been deleted and notifies all views of the change.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.
stageNum
The stage that was deleted.

Called when a stage has been movied and notifies all views of the change.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.
from
The original position of the stage.
to
The new position of the stage.

Called when a material attribute has been edited and notifies all views of the change.
materialDoc
The material that has changed.
stage
The stage that contains the changed attribute.
attribName
The name of the attribute that changed.
Responsible for managing the materials that are being viewed and/or edited.
